remarks: Value of the pairing functor on objects.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jan-2017.)
statement:
prfval.k $e |- P = ( F pairF G ) $.
prfval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
prfval.h $e |- H = ( Hom ` C ) $.
prfval.c $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( C Func D ) ) $.
prfval.d $e |- ( ph -> G e. ( C Func E ) ) $.
prf1.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
prf1 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( 1st ` P ) ` X ) = <. ( ( 1st ` F ) ` X ) , ( ( 1st ` G ) ` X ) >. ) $.
